article_title: Barclays Energy Analyst Moving to ISI Group
article_text:
Energy-stock analyst James West, has left Barclays PLC, is heading to research and brokerage firm International Strategy & Investment Group LLC, known as ISI Group, this fall.

Mr. West, a prominent oil-services and drilling company analyst, will start at ISI in September. Mr. West has left Barclays and is on so-called garden leave, a common...
